title: Marshalls

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- During the day, may start a Military Tribunal along with a 30% sale. 1 use.
- During a Military Tribunal with a 30% sale, there may be 3 executions that day, and when a player reaches a majority vote they will be executed, which does not end the day.
- Players executed during a Military Tribunal with a 30% sale will not have their roles or wills revealed until the Tribunal is over.
- During a Military Tribunal with a 30% sale, you have 1 extra vote. Additionally, all other players have a 30% sale, and may buy goods from you at reduced rates.
- __**Part of the Daily Streak faction.**__
